{{Description|Certified Player Rena, the Navbed of Romaritime Harbor. Thanks to the extensive use of clockwork meka and other well-engineered machinery in the harbor, the work of the Navbed is usually none too taxing. As such, Rena often plays a few rounds of Genius Invokation TCG when the appropriate occasion arises, and has become quite skilled...|[[Map]] description}}

===Guest Challenge===
{{Dialogue Start}}
;(Talk to Rena)
:'''Rena:''' Finally, a vacation! I hope the card games during this trip will really help me relax...
:'''Rena:''' Would you like to play a game with me?
:{{DIcon|TCG}} Let's play Genius Invokation TCG!
:;(Open Genius Invokation TCG match interface)
:{{DIcon}} I've got other things to do right now...
::'''Rena:''' It's fine. Maybe we'll meet again in Romaritime Harbor. We can always play then.

;(If the player loses the match)
:'''Rena:''' You didn't give it your all, did you? I'm a guest, sure, but there's no need to be so nice to me.

;(If the player wins the match)
:'''Rena:''' You played really well. I had lots of fun!
{{Dialogue End}}
